regime.advisory: Strategy only profitable in Trend + Volatile regime. High regime concentration risk. Catastrophic drawdown in Trend + Quiet (9614.3% MaxDD). Strategy underperforms in: Trend + Quiet, Range + Quiet, Range + Volatile.
